Text.Page:
Vulcans are next on this list. {@LinkCreature:24#12#covetous vulcans} and {@LinkCreature:24#62#yearning vulcans}, to be specific.

They'll be on the western coast of Aurum Road.

Once you're done, report to Raquib.
Good work, soldier. You have my thanks and the gratitude of everyone here.
The vulcanuses are near the ruins. Remind them what the Valkyon Federation can do!
